sentences.sContent: Sometimes you have to sacrifice efficiency for effectiveness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sometimes you have to sacrifice efficiency for effectiveness.
sentences.sCn: 有时候你需要牺牲效率来达到效果。

sentences.sContent: However, its viability and effectiveness still have to be established.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, its viability and effectiveness still have to be established.
sentences.sCn: 然而，它的有效性和可行性尚有待验证。

sentences.sContent: So, how do you manage and measure the effectiveness of your IT governance solution for your business?
sentences.sContent_eng: So, how do you manage and measure the effectiveness of your IT governance solution for your business?
sentences.sCn: 那么，您如何管理并度量面向您的企业的 IT 治理解决方案的有效性呢？

words.tran: 有效的，起作用的；实际的，实在的；给人深刻印象
奏效的；会应验的；有法律效力的
有效地，生效地；有力地；实际上
[生理] 效应器；[遗] 效应物；操纵装置
